channel.title: Comments on: Everything’s Not Lost
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: I know exactly what you mean. And it's really hard to maintain that, even though it's your own piece of mind you're protecting. I have been trying to maintain the positive belief that the universe is taking care of moving me closer toward "the beloved", and in that trust, just letting go of the sadness. Move on to more productive things. But god, it's really hard...m
item.content:encoded: I know exactly what you mean. And it’s really hard to maintain that, even though it’s your own piece of mind you’re protecting. I have been trying to maintain the positive belief that the universe is taking care of moving me closer toward “the beloved”, and in that trust, just letting go of the sadness. Move on to more productive things. But god, it’s really hard…m
